Package de.javasoft.swing.jydocking

Interface Summary
IBorderManager This interface provides a set of methods used by the DockingPort class to manage border state after docking and undocking operations.
IDockable This interface is designed to specify the API's required by DockingManager and DockingPort for dealing with dockable components in a drag-n-drop fashion.
IDockableAcceptor This interface is designed to specify your own rules to allow/accept dragged dockables.
IDockingConstants A collection of constants used by the docking framework.
IDockingEventListener Base listener for docking events.
IDockingPort This interface is designed to specify the API's required by DockingManager for placing Dockable instances within a container.
IDockingStrategy This interface defines an API used by DockingManager and DockingPort to support customizable behaviors during docking operations.
ILayoutNode Nodes interface for the perspective model.
IPerspectiveFactory Perspective factory.
IPerspectiveListener Listener for perspectives.
IPerspectiveManager The PerspectiveManager is responsible for managing docking layout state.
IPerspectiveModelListener ModelListener interface for perspectives.
IRegionChecker This interface provides an API for determining the desired regional bounds for a Dockable component.
 

Class Summary
BorderManager This class provides a standard implementation of the BorderManager interface.
DockableComponentWrapper This class models a IDockable implementation for wrapping a Component.
Dockbar JYDocking dockbar component - placed at the frame border and holds dockables in minimzed state.
DockbarEvent DockbarEvent class.
DockbarLabel Rotatable label used to display minimized dockables within dockbar.
DockbarSlidePanel SlidePanel for dockbars to slide in/out dockables.
DockingEvent Event class for docking events.
DockingManager This class is used as a public facade into the framework docking system.
DockingPath DockingPath.
DockingPort This is a Container that implements the IDockingPort interface.
DockingState The DockingState is used by the currently installed PerspectiveManager to track information regarding a Dockable's current state in the docking layout.
DockingStrategy Default docking strategy implementation.
DragOutlinePreview Dragging preview - by default a red outline border.
FloatingGroup This class models a grouping of Dockables within a floating DockingFrame.
Perspective Perspective for dockables.
PerspectiveEvent Perspective event class.
PerspectiveManager Manager class for perspectives.
PerspectiveModel Perspective model.
PerspectiveModelEvent Perspective model event class.
